func:
msg.payload = "SELECT TOP 100 a.moniker,a.Opened,a.Closed,a.TransFlag,CAST(a.TransFlag AS varbinary(8)) AS TransFlag_Hex \
,a.TypeFlag \
,CASE WHEN a.TransFlag & 0x00000001 = 0x00000001 THEN 'разрешено зачисление' ELSE '' END \
,CASE WHEN a.TransFlag & 0x00000002 = 0x00000002 THEN 'разрешено списание' ELSE '' END \
,CASE WHEN a.TransFlag & 0x00010000 = 0x00010000 THEN 'банковский арест. выполняется одновременно с обычным'  ELSE '' END \
FROM Accounts a (NOLOCK) \
WHERE \
a.moniker in ('26202130026000.100101.980','26202130026000.100102.980','26202130026000.100103.980')";


return msg;

Уважаемый Клиент {{payload.cliName}}
Это тестовое сообщение из NodRed, осталось разобрться автоматическая отправка на дату.

SET NOCOUNT ON

DECLARE		@OwnerId			TInt				,
			@TaskCode			TCode		= 'Users',
			@ParamCode			TCode		= NULL,
			@Callerid			TInt		= 2514	,
			@Value				TInfo		= NULL,
			@Moniker			TCode		,
			@CurrencyTag		TTag		,
			@Cash				TCode		,
			@Cnt				TInt		= 0	

		

DECLARE risk1 CURSOR LOCAL READ_ONLY FOR

SELECT	distinct 	a.code ,
					a.CurrencyTag,
				--	ap.Code,
					u.id

from	Accounts a with(nolock)

--join	AccPurpos ap with(nolock)
--on		ap.Id			= a.AccPurpose

join	ProfAccs pa with(nolock)
on		pa.AccountId	= a.Id

join	Profiles p with(nolock)
on		p.id			= pa.ProfileId 

join	users u with(nolock)
on		u.ProfileId		= p.id 
and		u.flag			= 7
and		u.PermitFlag	= 0
and		u.id			= 5382

where	a.PermitFlag	= 0
and  substring(a.code,1,4)	= '1002'
and		p.PermitFlag	= 0;


OPEN risk1

WHILE 1 = 1

BEGIN
		FETCH NEXT
		FROM risk1
		INTO	@Moniker	,
				@CurrencyTag,
				@Cash		,
				@Ownerid

		IF		@@FETCH_STATUS <> 0
				BREAK


	
				IF		@CurrencyTag = ''						-- Гривна
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value		= @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_UAH';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = ''
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value		= @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_UAH';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'USD'					-- Долар США
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_USD';
				end


				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'USD'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_USD';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'EUR'					-- Євро
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_EUR';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'EUR'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_EUR';
				end


				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'CZK'					-- Чеська крона
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_CZK';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'CZK'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_CZK';
				end


				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'HUF'					-- Форинт
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_HUF';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'HUF'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_HUF';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'MDL'					-- Молдовська лея
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_MDL';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'MDL'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_MDL';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'RUB'					-- Російський рубль
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_RUB';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'RUB'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_RUB';
				end
		

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'CHF'					-- Швейцарський франк
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_CHF';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'CHF'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_CHF';
				end


				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'BYN'					-- Білоруський рубль
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_BYN';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'BYN'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_BYN';
				end


				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'GBP'					-- Фунт стерлінгів
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_GBP';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'GBP'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_GBP';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'RON'					-- Румунський лей
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_RON';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'RON'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_RON';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'PLN'					-- Злотий
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_PLN';
				end

				IF		@CurrencyTag = 'PLN'
						AND	@Cash = 'CASH:NIGHT'
				begin
					SET @Value = @Moniker
					SET @ParamCode	= 'CUSTOM_NIGTH_CASH_PLN';
				end

		IF		@Value IS NOT NULL 
			AND @ParamCode IS NOT NULL
			begin 
		
			SET @Cnt = @Cnt + 1
					EXEC dbo.p_EditConnotationValues 
							@Id				= 0							, 
							@BillId			= @OwnerId					, 
							@ParamCode		= @ParamCode				, 
							@TaskCode		= @TaskCode					, 
							@Value			= @Value					, 
							@CallerId		= @Callerid					, 
							@Mode			= 3
			
		
			--select @Value	,@ParamCode,	@OwnerId	
			
			end	
			 

END
CLOSE		risk1
DEALLOCATE	risk1

SELECT @Cnt

template:
select distinct
cv4.value as Login,
--u.code as login,
u.Name as FIO,
u.Job as  Posada,
cv3.value as BranchId,
p.name as Branch,
p.address as Adress,
cv.Value as UAH,
cv1.Value as USD,
cv2.Value as EUR
from users u with(nolock)

join Profiles p with(nolock)
on p.id=u.ProfileId


join ConnotationValues cv with(nolock)
on cv.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl with(nolock)
on cl.id =cv.ListId and cl.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_UAH' and cl.TaskCode='Users' 
join ConnotationValues cv1 with(nolock)
on cv1.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl1 with(nolock)
on cl1.id =cv1.ListId and cl1.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_USD' and cl1.TaskCode='Users' 
join ConnotationValues cv2 with(nolock)
on cv2.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl2 with(nolock)
on cl2.id =cv2.ListId and cl2.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_EUR' and cl2.TaskCode='Users'
join ConnotationValues cv3 with(nolock)
on cv3.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl3 with(nolock)
on cl3.id =cv3.ListId and cl3.ParamCode='SecretKeyBranchId' and cl3.TaskCode='Users'

on cv4.OwnerId=u.Id

template:
declare @Date_amount DAteTime
set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in
(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez

--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

Declare @DocInfo VarChar(120),@MainAmount money,@Status int

--set @DocInfo='Македон Євгеній Віталійович;;;;,;;;;'
set @DocInfo='Петров Євгеній Віталійович;;;;,;;;;'
--set @MainAmount=@MainAmount
set @DocInfo='{{payload.docInfo}}'
set @MainAmount='{{payload.mainAmount}}'

--set @MainAmount=399701
set @Status=1
--set @MainAmount=399600

create table #rez(Id int, crncyamount money,mainamount money)

insert into #rez(Id,mainamount)
select 
b.Id,
b.mainamount
from bills b with (nolock)
join sv_RepoParams sv on sv.OwnerId=b.id and sv.TaskCode='bills' and sv.ParamCode='DocInfo'

where b.ActionId=336
AND ( ( 0=1 OR ( ProcessFlag & 3 = 1 ) OR ( ProcessFlag & 3 = 3 ) ) )
and sv.Param=@DocInfo
-- and substring(sv.Param, 0, sv.Param.ndex(';'))=@FIO
and b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())




If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
Begin

If (select sum(mainamount) from #rez)<400000
       begin

             If ((select sum(mainamount) from #rez)+@MainAmount)<=400000
                    Begin

                          Set @Status=1
                    End
             Else 
                    Begin

                          set @MainAmount=400000-(select sum(mainamount) from #rez)-@MainAmount
                          
                          Set @Status=1
                    End
             
       end
       else
       Begin
             set @MainAmount=0
             Set @Status=0
       end
end

If @MainAmount<0
Begin
       set @MainAmount=0   
       set @Status=0
end


If @MainAmount>400000
Begin
       --set @MainAmount=MainAmount
       set @Status=0
end


drop table #rez


select @Status AS Status, @MainAmount AS MainAmount

/*
"participant" : {
   "bankAccountId" : "1" ,
   "bankCode" : "320478" ,
   "dic" : "1" ,
   "ean" : "1" ,
   "edrpou" : "23697280" ,
   "eic" : "0" ,
   "iban" : "UA133204780000026007924864736" ,
   "ic" : "1" ,
   "name" : "АТ ДТЕК ДНІПРОЕНЕРГО" ,
   "particId" : "1",

   "data" : {
       "currency" : "UAH" ,
       "type" : "limit" ,
       "value" : "1121.42"
   }
 }
}
*/

SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
ORDER BY a.Id;

/*
SELECT * 
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328'
	, 'UA853204780000026025000003330')
	* FROM sv_Amounts
*/
/*
SELECT '<Participant name="' + a.ClientName + '" iban="' + a.IBAN + '" edrpou="' + a.StateCode + '" bankCode="300465">' + '<DataGroups>
<TotalsData>
<Data value="' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) + '" type="limit" currency="'

template:
--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez

template:
select distinct
cv4.value as Login,
--u.code as login,
u.Name as FIO,
u.Job as  Posada,
cv3.value as BranchId,
p.name as Branch,
p.address as Adress,
cv.Value as UAH,
cv1.Value as USD,
cv2.Value as EUR
from users u with(nolock)

join Profiles p with(nolock)
on p.id=u.ProfileId


join ConnotationValues cv with(nolock)
on cv.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl with(nolock)
on cl.id =cv.ListId and cl.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_UAH' and cl.TaskCode='Users' 
join ConnotationValues cv1 with(nolock)
on cv1.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl1 with(nolock)
on cl1.id =cv1.ListId and cl1.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_USD' and cl1.TaskCode='Users' 
join ConnotationValues cv2 with(nolock)
on cv2.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl2 with(nolock)
on cl2.id =cv2.ListId and cl2.ParamCode='CUSTOM_DAY_CASH_EUR' and cl2.TaskCode='Users'
join ConnotationValues cv3 with(nolock)
on cv3.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl3 with(nolock)
on cl3.id =cv3.ListId and cl3.ParamCode='SecretKeyBranchId' and cl3.TaskCode='Users' 
join ConnotationValues cv4 with(nolock)
on cv4.OwnerId=u.Id 
join ConnotationList cl4 with(nolock)
on cl4.id =cv4.ListId and cl4.ParamCode='SecretKeyUserCode' and cl4.TaskCode='Users' 


where 
 u.flag=7 and u.PermitFlag=0
and cv4.value = '{{payload.userCode}}'

--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA233204780000026028335002962', 'UA053204780000026029335002961', 'UA493204780000026020335002960', 'UA763204780000026020335002959', 'UA583204780000026021335002958', 'UA403204780000026022335002957', 'UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez
